alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:19PM CDT until April 17 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MADISON PARISH...NORTHWESTERN WARREN AND SOUTH CENTRAL ISSAQUENA COUNTIES... At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Omega, or 8 miles northeast of Tallulah, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Eagle Bend around 525 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
